about_the_game:
Use your wit and courage to uncover the mysteries hidden in every corner

The journey to discover the truth is always full of surprises and challenges, especially in the small town of Harstad, which seems to be hiding many untold secrets. Recently, the peace of the town has been shattered by a series of unusual events, and all the clues point to those forgotten underground passages. The mayor has sent out a hero's thread, gathering a group of intrepid explorers who will go deep underground and uncover the veil of ancient mysteries

The Story of the White Cat Stories is a classic 2D platform-jumping game that takes you through forests and small towns until you reach the bottom of a well and explore the deep and mysterious underground world. Here, you will engage in fierce battles with resurrected demons, meet your partners, and bravely march to the demon's door, step by step to uncover the truth of ancient mysteries.

Game Features

  • Retro charm of side-scrolling jumps: Classic side-scrolling level design, paired with cartoonish art, takes you back to the golden age of gaming.

  • Smooth 2D control experience: Whether it is melee attack, lunge forward or long-range shooting, combined with a rich skill set, let you navigate the dangerous situation.

  • Adventure in the underground world: Explore the ancient pathways that have been buried, uncover the conspiracies behind them, and be careful of the crises that lurk in the shadows.

  • The fun of skill upgrades: As the game progresses, you will constantly unlock new skills, learn new combat techniques, and increase your strength and speed.

  • Partner Power: Together with your friendly partners, defeat those powerful enemies and make your battle journey no longer alone.

    Are you ready? Grab your sword, put on your armor, and let's go on this adventure full of unknowns and surprises!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Operating System: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip or Intel Core i5 processor.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or dedicated graphics card supporting OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Operating System: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro chip or Intel Core i7 processor.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or dedicated graphics card supporting Metal
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card:

name: 白猫骑士物语/White Cat Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7, 8, 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card DirectX Version: 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:

short_description: "White Cat Stories" is a 2D platformer game. In this game, players take on the role of brave knight on a journey that is both dangerous and magical. Our protagonist is a fallen knight, in order to find her purpose in life, she embarks on a journey.
